snippet: The Denver Broncos survived a fourth-quarter fightback by the San Diego Chargers to claim a 24-17 win on Sunday and advance to the AFC Championship game for the first time in eight years....

headline.print_headline: Broncos Survive Chargers Rally to Reach AFC Championship Game
headline.main: Broncos Survive Chargers Rally to Reach AFC Championship Game

lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos survived a fourth-quarter fightback by the San Diego Chargers to claim a 24-17 win on Sunday and advance to the AFC Championship game for the first time in eight years.
